change_language: The language has been changed to English.
reset_suggestion_channel: The suggestion channel has been reset.
reset_suggestion_channel_error: The suggestion channel could not be reset because it could not be found. >:c
add_suggestion_under: Write your suggestion below this text.
already_voted_again: You have already changed your choice.
already_voted_rechoice: You have already voted. If you changed your opinion, you can re-vote with the buttons below this message.
already_voted_option: You have already voted for that option.
already_accepted: This suggestion has been accepted, so you can no longer vote.
already_declined: This suggestion has been declined, so you can no longer vote.
suggest_badlink:
The suggestion was not sent because it looks too similar to Nitro Scam messages.
If you think this suggestion was not a Nitro Scam, please contact an admin.
suggest_channel_not_set: Sorry! The suggestion channel has not been set yet!
suggest_none_found: A message from you with this ID does not exist in the suggestions channel.
suggest_none: You haven't made a suggestion yet.
suggest_accepted_text: This suggestion has been marked as accepted.
suggest_declined_text: This suggestion has been marked as declined.
suggest_cannot_edit: This suggestion cannot be edited because it has already been reviewed by a moderator.
suggest_bot_not_author: This suggestion cannot be edited because the bot is not the author of the message.
suggest_reset_to_og_state: The suggestion has been reset to its original state.
embed_invalid_color: The color you entered is invalid. Please enter a valid color. You can find valid colors here: https://www.hexcolortool.com/
not_valid_option: You didn't choose a valid option. Please choose at least one of the options given.
suggestion_auto_accept_upvotes: Suggestion has been automatically accepted because it has reached the required number of upvotes.
suggestion_auto_decline_downvotes: Suggestion has been automatically declined because it has reached the required number of downvotes.
